The objective of this workshop, co-organized by the
[FRB-CESAB](https://www.fondationbiodiversite.fr/en/about-the-foundation/le-cesab/)
and the working group
[FREE](https://www.fondationbiodiversite.fr/en/the-frb-in-action/programs-and-projects/le-cesab/free/) 
is to give a general introduction to functional ecology. During the practice session,
participants will learn to calculate various functional rarity and diversity index.


<br />
